item.description:
****NEW****
Since the weather looks like it is going to be beautiful, and the group is getting large, how about we meet on the common prior to the talk? This will give us an opportunity to introduce ourselves and meet before the discussion. We can meet near the bandstand. I'll be there about 4:30pm, feel free to come early and chat before we cross the street and head into the church.

Learn more about how you can grow the most nutritious, tasty greens in your own backyard. Sue Ventura of Dragonflly Farms, a regular Westford Farmers Market vendor, will give you tips on how to plant your best season's crops organically.

I will be there wearing an orange bandanna. My name is Casey.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Organic Farming/Gardening Discussion
